Basic gulp boilerplate

Simple gulp setup and minimal boilerplate for Bootstrap Layout.
boilerplate code

Demo

You can see a working live demo of this boilerplate.

Features

  • simple gulp workflow
  • compile Sass using gulp-sass (gulp wrapper for node-sass)
  • import Sass files directly from node_modules using sass-importer-npm
  • example of customizing Bootstrap Layout colors
{% markdown %} ### Usage #### Clone the boilerplate repository ```bash git clone https://github.com/themekit/bs-layout-boilerplate-gulp.git my-project ``` ```bash cd my-project ``` #### Install dependencies ```bash npm install ``` #### Build ```bash gulp ``` {% endmarkdown %}
